projects.title: AR Application Hone Virtual Education - Paramedic/EMS Training Application
projects.desctitle: AR Application Hone Virtual Education - Paramedic/EMS Training Application.
projects.desc: Augmented Reality training application for paramedics and EMS staff.  Training in  Cue recognition for patients with Respiratory Failure states.  Developed with Unity and Apple ARKit for iOS.

projects.title: Exxon Mobil Teal Cylinder Hazardous Chemicals Training
projects.desctitle: Oculus Quest and Windows Mixed Reality VR Training Application.
projects.desc: I was involved for both the Product and Project Management as well as the Development of this Unity project for Exxon Mobil, delivered for Windows Mixed Reality, HTC Vive and Oculus Quest. This is an early development stage video showing an initial sub-set of tasks.
projects.platform: Windows Mixed Reality, Oculus Quest, HTC Vive
